ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of CONNIE LOIS GRAHAM of London, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the board of directors of The Federal Bridge Corporation Limited, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, effective February 1, 2015.
